name: Equipt Health
headline: Home medical equipment, prescribed online and delivered.
description: Equipt Health makes it easy for any healthcare company to offer prescription medical devices to patients. We handle the whole process: the packaging, the logistics, the clinical (via our provider network) and technical support, and the return of data from connected devices. We're starting with the diagnosis and treatment of sleep apnea at heliosleep.com.

founders.name: Rebecca Weisinger, Founder
founders.description: Rebecca Weisinger is the co-founder and CEO of Equipt Health, which she started with Max Greenfeld in 2021. She earned a degree in Chemistry from Harvard University.

founders.name: Max Greenfeld, Founder
founders.description: Max Greenfeld is the co-founder of Equipt Health. He previously led data and engineering projects as an early employee at Q Bio and Genapsys. He completed a PhD from Stanford.

# Treating sleep apnea has never been easier
Order prescription home sleep apnea tests and treatment devices delivered to your door.
![Man and woman taking a morning walk](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e381934b4044728c9396f7/62919c4e161a41055cd06110_Landing%20Background%202%20\(1\).png)
Thank you! Your submission has been received!
Oops! Something went wrong while submitting the form.
## How we help
FDA-approved solutions from the top manufacturers
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e387074a2037b6c14d6e33/61fc182a59164122e691f616_NIGHTOWL.png)](http://www.equipthealth.com/</product-old/night-owl-home-sleep-apnea-test>)
#### [NightOwl Home Sleep Apnea Test$110.00](http://www.equipthealth.com/<https:/store.heliosleep.com/home/20-home-sleep-test.html>)[Order Now](http://www.equipthealth.com/<https:/store.heliosleep.com/home/20-home-sleep-test.html>)
Home sleep apnea test, interpretation, and a prescription for treatment devices if diagnosed
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e387074a2037b6c14d6e33/6205519430b51f5a11698f99_Zzoma%20belt%20pic%202.png)](http://www.equipthealth.com/</product-old/zzoma-positional-device>)
#### [Zzoma Positional Device$189.95](http://www.equipthealth.com/<https:/store.heliosleep.com/home/22-zzoma-positional-device.html>)[Order Now](http://www.equipthealth.com/<https:/store.heliosleep.com/home/22-zzoma-positional-device.html>)
Prescription positional device for the treatment of mild to moderate positional obstructive sleep apnea (OSA)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e387074a2037b6c14d6e33/61f97db3f7505b49cf9c5c63_myTAP%20with%20Mouth%20Shield%20\(1\)%20copy.jpg)](http://www.equipthealth.com/</product-old/mytap-oral-appliance-for-snoring-sleep-apnea>)
#### [myTAP Oral Appliance For Snoring & Sleep Apnea$199.00](http://www.equipthealth.com/<https:/store.heliosleep.com/home/21--mytap-oral-appliance-for-snoring-sleep-apnea.html>)[Order Now](http://www.equipthealth.com/<https:/store.heliosleep.com/home/21--mytap-oral-appliance-for-snoring-sleep-apnea.html>)
Precision-fit sleep apnea appliance and snore guard
![Satisfaction guarantee](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e381934b4044728c9396f7/61fe2633e9f6250a6b140808_seal.png)
We're proud to offer a 30-day money back guarantee on oral appliances and sleep positioners
“myTAP works like a charm. Easy to make, Fits well. Slept well. First time in 2 months my husband didn’t have to go downstairs to get away from me gasping! Yay! Thank you so much.”
**Patient of Dr. Paul Kenworthy**
“We are big believers that oral appliance therapy can be an excellent therapy.”
**Dennis Hwang, MD on myTAP**
“My husband has been using Airway's device in excess of five years with great success. It is simple to use and quite comfortable. We have recommended it to friends who were considering a non-customized device. This is actually his second TAP because the first one got eaten by the dog. True story.”
**Julie Ronay**
## How it works
![Provider reviewing patient record and sleep history](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e381934b4044728c9396f7/61e381934b40446a59939713_review.png)
##### Get Started
Based on your symptoms and history, a Helio provider will prescribe a home sleep study if appropriate.
![Efficient delivery of sleep apnea tests and treatments](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e381934b4044728c9396f7/61e381934b404458cf939711_package.png)
##### Receive Your Equipment
We'll ship your home sleep apnea test. If diagnosed, we'll send sleep apnea treatment devices to your door.
![Informative sleep coaching](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e381934b4044728c9396f7/61e381934b4044f7c4939712_happy.png)
##### Chat with Care Coach
Your Helio care coach will reach out to make sure that everything is on track as you treat sleep apnea at home.
## Learn more about sleep apnea and snoring
[![Sleeping mother and child](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e387074a2037b6c14d6e33/62676b0b5af92d5ca4b86755_christin-hume-Hcfwew744z4-unsplash.jpg)](http://www.equipthealth.com/</posts/the-berlin-questionnaire>)
## [The Berlin Questionnaire and Sleep Apnea: A Brief Introduction](http://www.equipthealth.com/</posts/the-berlin-questionnaire>)
[![Sleeping mother and child](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e387074a2037b6c14d6e33/6263535e75fa5a7dec27bd39_bruno-van-der-kraan-i4rOpdj444c-unsplash.jpg)](http://www.equipthealth.com/</posts/didgeridoo-and-sleep-apnea>)
## [Didgeridoo and Sleep Apnea: Can This Instrument Heal Your Sleep Issues?](http://www.equipthealth.com/</posts/didgeridoo-and-sleep-apnea>)
[![Sleeping mother and child](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e387074a2037b6c14d6e33/6262045865a70f178956705c_pexels-%D0%BF%D0%B0%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%BB-%D1%81%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%BA%D0%B8%D0%BD-2324837.jpg)](http://www.equipthealth.com/</posts/surgical-alternatives-for-sleep-apnea>)
## [5 Alternatives to Surgical Treatment for Sleep Apnea](http://www.equipthealth.com/</posts/surgical-alternatives-for-sleep-apnea>)
[![Sleeping mother and child](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e387074a2037b6c14d6e33/6261fb8e2a8b14a4905ed31b_pexels-tim-gouw-52608.jpg)](http://www.equipthealth.com/</posts/long-term-effects-of-sleep-apnea>)
## [8 Long-Term Effects of Sleep Apnea You Need to Know](http://www.equipthealth.com/</posts/long-term-effects-of-sleep-apnea>)
[Visit Our Blog](http://www.equipthealth.com/</blog>)
## Treat your sleep apnea
Get started with Helio Sleep and get a team of specialists who will collaborate to provide you with new obstructive sleep apnea (OSA) treatment options.
[Book a Free Consult](http://www.equipthealth.com/<#>)
![Provider reviewing home sleep apnea test results](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e381934b4044728c9396f7/61f1be112af6efb4161e1915_pexels-cottonbro-7578804.jpg)
[Get Started](http://www.equipthealth.com/</order>)
[Home](http://www.equipthealth.com/</>)[Order](http://www.equipthealth.com/<https:/store.heliosleep.com/>)[FAQ](http://www.equipthealth.com/</faq>)[Contact](http://www.equipthealth.com/</contact>)[Local Centers](http://www.equipthealth.com/</sleep-centers>)
[Community](http://www.equipthealth.com/<https:/community.heliosleep.com/>)[About](http://www.equipthealth.com/</about>)[Privacy Policy](http://www.equipthealth.com/</privacy-policy>)[Terms of Use](http://www.equipthealth.com/</terms-of-use>)info@heliosleep.com
Notice to Medicare and Medicaid Beneficiaries. Medicare and Medicaid will pay for medical equipment and supplies only if a supplier has a Medicare or Medicaid supplier number. Helio Sleep does not have a Medicare or Medicaid supplier number. Medicare or Medicaid will not pay for any medical equipment and supplies we sell or rent to you. You will be personally and fully responsible for payment.
✖
## Looking for better sleep?
Get started today on treating sleep apnea!

generated_description:
**Equipt Health Overview**

Founded in 2021 and based in Seattle, WA, Equipt Health aims to revolutionize how patients access medical equipment by providing a straightforward online platform for purchasing prescribed home medical devices. As part of Y Combinator's Batch S21, they've carved out a niche in the sleep health space, focusing initially on sleep apnea through their brand, Helio Sleep.

**Mission & Services**

Equipt Health's mission is to simplify the process of obtaining home medical equipment. They manage everything from the logistics of delivery to the technical support required for using connected devices. They aim to create a seamless user experience for healthcare companies and their patients, especially in the treatment of sleep apnea.

Through their website, HelioSleep.com, patients can order FDA-approved home sleep apnea tests and treatment devices that are shipped directly to their door. They offer tools like the NightOwl Home Sleep Apnea Test, Zzoma Positional Device, and the myTAP Oral Appliance, each designed to address various aspects of obstructive sleep apnea. 

**How It Works**

1. **Get Started**: Patients answer a quiz about their symptoms and history, which helps a provider determine if a home sleep study is appropriate.
2. **Receive Your Equipment**: If diagnosed, treatment devices will be sent to the doorstep.
3. **Care Coaching**: A Helio care coach reaches out to ensure patients are on track with their treatment.

**Why It Matters**

Sleep apnea affects millions, impairing their quality of life. Equipt Health is tackling this by making diagnosis and treatment more accessible. By employing telemedicine and a user-friendly approach, they stand to help thousands reclaim healthy, restful sleep.

With a backing from a reputed incubator and a dedicated team, Equipt Health is well-positioned to expand beyond sleep apnea and impact consumer health services on a larger scale. Their innovative approach could serve as a blueprint for how digital health services evolve moving forward.

For those ready to take control of their sleep health, Equipt Health offers an easy entry point: start with their online platforms, engage with their community, and explore the science-backed solutions they provide.
  
**Where to Learn More**

Visit [Equipt Health](http://www.equipthealth.com) to explore their offerings, and if sleep issues are on your mind, you might just find the solution you've been looking for!
